001package com.technototes.path.command;
002
003import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.geometry.Pose2d;
004import com.technototes.library.command.Command;
005import com.technototes.path.subsystem.MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem;
006import com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence.TrajectorySequence;
007import com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence.TrajectorySequenceBuilder;
008import java.util.function.BiFunction;
009import java.util.function.Function;
010import java.util.function.Supplier;
011
012public class TrajectorySequenceCommand implements Command {
013
014    public TrajectorySequence trajectory;
015    public MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem subsystem;
016
017    public TrajectorySequenceCommand(MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem sub, TrajectorySequence t) {
018        addRequirements(sub);
019        subsystem = sub;
020        trajectory = t;
021    }
022
023    public TrajectorySequenceCommand(
024        MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem sub,
025        Function<Function<Pose2d, TrajectorySequenceBuilder>, TrajectorySequence> t
026    ) {
027        addRequirements(sub);
028        subsystem = sub;
029        trajectory = t.apply(sub::trajectorySequenceBuilder);
030    }
031
032    public TrajectorySequenceCommand(
033        MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem sub,
034        Supplier<TrajectorySequence> t
035    ) {
036        addRequirements(sub);
037        subsystem = sub;
038        trajectory = t.get();
039    }
040
041    public <T> TrajectorySequenceCommand(
042        MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem sub,
043        BiFunction<Function<Pose2d, TrajectorySequenceBuilder>, T, TrajectorySequence> t,
044        T mux
045    ) {
046        addRequirements(sub);
047        subsystem = sub;
048        trajectory = t.apply(sub::trajectorySequenceBuilder, mux);
049    }
050
051    public <T> TrajectorySequenceCommand(
052        MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem sub,
053        Function<T, TrajectorySequence> t,
054        T mux
055    ) {
056        addRequirements(sub);
057        subsystem = sub;
058        trajectory = t.apply(mux);
059    }
060
061    @Override
062    public void initialize() {
063        subsystem.followTrajectorySequenceAsync(trajectory);
064    }
065
066    @Override
067    public void execute() {
068        subsystem.update();
069    }
070
071    @Override
072    public boolean isFinished() {
073        return !subsystem.isBusy();
074    }
075
076    @Override
077    public void end(boolean cancel) {
078        if (cancel) subsystem.stop();
079    }
080}
